Quote.Author: Ida Lupino
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather work all night and sleep all day... perhaps I was a mole in my last incarnation

Quote.Author: Ida Lupino
Quote.QuoteValue: I had no desire to crash a man's world

Quote.Author: Ida Lupino
Quote.QuoteValue: Any woman who wishes to smash into the world of men isn't very feminine

Quote.Author: Ida Lupino
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't see myself as any advance guard, or feminist

Quote.Author: Ida Lupino
Quote.QuoteValue: I knew it would break his heart if I didn't go into the business

Quote.Author: Ida Lupino
Quote.QuoteValue: Keeping a feminine approach is vital - men hate bossy females

Quote.Author: Ida Lupino
Quote.QuoteValue: Whereupon, at the tender age of thirteen, I set upon the path of playing nothing but hookers

Quote.Author: Idina Menzel
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to originate new roles and characters for musical theater

Quote.Author: Idina Menzel
Quote.QuoteValue: I just enjoy being onstage and relating to the audience

Quote.Author: Idina Menzel
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is I love musical theater and always have

Quote.Author: Idina Menzel
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a role model is about being true to myself

Quote.Author: Idina Menzel
Quote.QuoteValue: Things happen for a reason, and in their own time

Quote.Author: Idina Menzel
Quote.QuoteValue: There are lots of things I'm acquainting myself with now to be a more well-rounded person

Quote.Author: Idina Menzel
Quote.QuoteValue: The most successful people are so original

Quote.Author: Idina Menzel
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't quite know how to put it into words, but I feel for the audience that I have; I know them

Quote.Author: Idina Menzel
Quote.QuoteValue: I started singing weddings and bar mitzvahs at 15, lying about my age. It was a great discipline

Quote.Author: Idina Menzel
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm smart enough to know to work with smart people

Quote.Author: Idris Elba
Quote.QuoteValue: Not obsessed with particularly Nike, but sneakers in general. I love them

Quote.Author: Idris Elba
Quote.QuoteValue: I would never be fearful of any character

Quote.Author: Idris Elba
Quote.QuoteValue: In some countries, no one knows who Idris Elba is

Quote.Author: Idris Elba
Quote.QuoteValue: Whether it's music or acting, that creativity all comes from the same source

Quote.Author: Idris Elba
Quote.QuoteValue: Africans, we hold on to our youths and whip them into shape

Quote.Author: Idris Elba
Quote.QuoteValue: I was into Spider Man when I was a kid and that was the only comic I've ever read

Quote.Author: Idris Elba
Quote.QuoteValue: I tend to stay away from the comics

Quote.Author: Idris Elba
Quote.QuoteValue: You watch yourself age and it's hard to feel like a sex symbol

Quote.Author: Idris Elba
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to play different roles. That's just the kind of actor I am

Quote.Author: Idris Elba
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been DJing mostly, and most DJs end up producing. That's just me

Quote.Author: Iggy Azalea
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd known since about eleven that I wanted to live in America

Quote.Author: Iggy Azalea
Quote.QuoteValue: I naturally want to be provocative

Quote.Author: Iggy Azalea
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that music is still art, even if it's commercialised

Quote.Author: Iggy Azalea
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't really watch basketball in Australia

Quote.Author: Iggy Azalea
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is art to me, and you don't censor art. You don't go into a museum and censor things

Quote.Author: Iggy Azalea
Quote.QuoteValue: I hated school so bad. I only liked art class during high school. I was always smart

Quote.Author: Iggy Azalea
Quote.QuoteValue: I love purple because my name is Amethyst

Quote.Author: Iggy Azalea
Quote.QuoteValue: Not every artist is a role model

Quote.Author: Iggy Azalea
Quote.QuoteValue: My real name is Amethyst. It sounds like a stage name. My mom is kind of crazy

Quote.Author: Iggy Azalea
Quote.QuoteValue: Being talked about like a package - I feel like that all the time

Quote.Author: Iggy Pop
Quote.QuoteValue: What did Christ really do? He hung out with hard-drinking fishermen

Quote.Author: Iggy Pop
Quote.QuoteValue: Living in England was wonderfully civil and easy-going

Quote.Author: Iggy Pop
Quote.QuoteValue: What some people would call antics, I would just call a good show

Quote.Author: Iggy Pop
Quote.QuoteValue: Stages are getting higher and higher, and I'm getting older and older

Quote.Author: Iggy Pop
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a travel enthusiast

Quote.Author: Iggy Pop
Quote.QuoteValue: I like music that's more offensive. I like it to sound like nails on a blackboard, get me wild

Quote.Author: Iggy Pop
Quote.QuoteValue: If I don't terrorize, I'm not Pop

Quote.Author: Iggy Pop
Quote.QuoteValue: She looked at me penetratingly. So I suppose you can figure out what happened next

Quote.Author: Iggy Pop
Quote.QuoteValue: I find it hard to focus looking forward. So I look backward

Quote.Author: Iggy Pop
Quote.QuoteValue: The more walking-around money I have, the less I walk around

Quote.Author: Ikue Mori
Quote.QuoteValue: Improvising things is always changing. A lot of momentum

Quote.Author: Ikue Mori
Quote.QuoteValue: Come to think of it, the way I play is like a drum machine- very mechanical

Quote.Author: Ikue Mori
Quote.QuoteValue: I got tired of different drum sounds so you buy different effects for more manipulation

Quote.Author: Ikue Mori
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm interested in stories and the dark side of peoples' minds

Quote.Author: Ikue Mori
Quote.QuoteValue: With a rock band, you play the same things over and over and over

Quote.Author: Ikue Mori
Quote.QuoteValue: Blood and death. That moves me

Quote.Author: Ikue Mori
Quote.QuoteValue: I really didn't intend to be a musician when I left Japan

Quote.Author: Ikue Mori
Quote.QuoteValue: I was playing in other rock bands. Any of those bands didn't last long

Quote.Author: Ikue Mori
Quote.QuoteValue: So now I don't have time to practice drums. It's been five years since I've touched the drums

Quote.Author: Ikue Mori
Quote.QuoteValue: I've done some music for films and I really enjoy doing it

Quote.Author: Illeana Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I know as I'm taking my dying breath, the ambulance guy will ask me why they cancelled Action

Quote.Author: Illeana Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I come from a pretty strange family

Quote.Author: Illeana Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: When I do a character, I try to base it on someone I have met or an experience I've had

Quote.Author: Illeana Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: We were big Saturday Night Live and Eddie Murphy fans

Quote.Author: Illeana Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: There's too much insecurity on studio sets, with all the people standing around, whispering

Quote.Author: Illeana Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: It's nice to see a movie where people are actually succeeding

Quote.Author: Illeana Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: In high school, my goal was to be a writer for SNL, then I got into the acting

Quote.Author: Illeana Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: The best situation is where they cast you and then they trust you

Quote.Author: Illeana Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge poster collector

Quote.Author: Illeana Douglas
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be an animated character. I'm also doing more writing and directing

Quote.Author: Iman
Quote.QuoteValue: Eliminating the things you love is not wellness. Wellness feeds your soul and makes you feel good

Quote.Author: Iman
Quote.QuoteValue: The people who are the most successful in life are not stopped by fear

Quote.Author: Iman
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is too short not to have pasta, steak, and butter

Quote.Author: Iman
Quote.QuoteValue: The day you settle for less is the day you will get less

Quote.Author: Iman
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty is being comfortable and confident in your own skin

Quote.Author: Iman
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the face of a refugee. I was once a refugee. I was with my family in exile

Quote.Author: Iman
Quote.QuoteValue: If I feel frustrated in a situation, I take a deep breath and walk away

Quote.Author: Iman
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really not a good idea to forecast or double guess the fates; you will always be fooled

Quote.Author: Iman
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody has ever said to me that I was pretty, 'til I met Peter Beard

Quote.Author: Iman
Quote.QuoteValue: My looks have changed. I have laugh lines - not wrinkles

Quote.Author: Imelda May
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see why women have to get naked to sell an album. It's crazy

Quote.Author: Imelda May
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big believer in 'pick yourself up, dust yourself off, and start again.'

Quote.Author: Imelda May
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't do grey. I like my colour, my style

Quote.Author: Imelda May
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm writing, I mean what I'm saying - there's a lot of me in each song

Quote.Author: Imelda May
Quote.QuoteValue: I was one of those annoying kids that loves singing and entertaining

Quote.Author: Imelda May
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in God

Quote.Author: Imelda May
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'd like to be one of those eccentric 80-year-old women

Quote.Author: Imelda May
Quote.QuoteValue: I never co-write. I've tried it before, and I just can't do it

Quote.Author: Imelda May
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy music so much; it's such a passion in my life, and I hope that comes across

Quote.Author: Imelda May
Quote.QuoteValue: I got my first leopard print coat when I was 15. I nearly got beat up, but I was happy with it

Quote.Author: Imelda Staunton
Quote.QuoteValue: You can only do your best. That's all you can do. And if it isn't good enough, it isn't good enough

Quote.Author: Imelda Staunton
Quote.QuoteValue: Agents and producers have to get you into a box to accommodate their limited imaginations

Quote.Author: Imelda Staunton
Quote.QuoteValue: Fortunately my career has never been about how I look, it's about how I can be

Quote.Author: Imelda Staunton
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always liked new writing

Quote.Author: Imelda Staunton
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're at an award ceremony, you're against your mates

Quote.Author: Imelda Staunton
Quote.QuoteValue: Look at Judi Dench, who's brilliant in whatever bloody job she does

Quote.Author: Imelda Staunton
Quote.QuoteValue: I was brought up a Catholic, so I take no pleasure in guilt

Quote.Author: Imelda Staunton
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always tried to fight against, 'Oh, who's that small funny actress? Let's get her.'

Quote.Author: Imelda Staunton
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of film stars are just playing themselves in different frocks

Quote.Author: Imelda Staunton
Quote.QuoteValue: Both my parents had heart problems: my mother had type 2 diabetes, and my father had a stroke

Quote.Author: Imogen Cunningham
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people say to me, Isn't it too bad that people discovered you so late? I never thought that

Quote.Author: Imogen Cunningham
Quote.QuoteValue: I became kind of a drop-out in science after I came back to America. I wanted to photograph

Quote.Author: Imogen Cunningham
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what love means

Quote.Author: Imogen Cunningham
Quote.QuoteValue: It's silly to keep people alive who have a terrible disease

Quote.Author: Imogen Cunningham
Quote.QuoteValue: I told the students that whatever they did in class was for the wastebasket

Quote.Author: Imogen Cunningham
Quote.QuoteValue: I think San Francisco is the best place in the whole world for an easy life

Quote.Author: Imogen Cunningham
Quote.QuoteValue: I turn people into human beings by not making them into gods

Quote.Author: Imogen Cunningham
Quote.QuoteValue: When people ask me silly questions about my private life, I just say, I don't discuss that

Quote.Author: Imogen Cunningham
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't love the world. I think Jupiter should have hit us

Quote.Author: Imogen Cunningham
Quote.QuoteValue: When you do portraits professionally it's not a desire, it's for money

Quote.Author: Imogen Poots
Quote.QuoteValue: San Francisco, coolest place ever

Quote.Author: Imogen Poots
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my real mom and dad; I love them both equally

Quote.Author: Imogen Poots
Quote.QuoteValue: I still try to be a feminist in some tiny way

Quote.Author: Imogen Poots
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm lucky in that I have close friends and family and my agent to advise me

Quote.Author: Imogen Poots
Quote.QuoteValue: I do think 'All Is by My Side' is the type of film I'm the most happiest

Quote.Author: Imogen Poots
Quote.QuoteValue: I love America a lot. I really do

Quote.Author: Imogen Poots
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm really honest, I'm not a huge fan of scary films

Quote.Author: Imogen Poots
Quote.QuoteValue: I can scare myself like a pro

Quote.Author: Imogen Poots
Quote.QuoteValue: I do admit to being slightly in love with Christopher Walken

Quote.Author: Imogen Poots
Quote.QuoteValue: If a role has been too one-dimensional, I have turned it down

Quote.Author: Imran Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: The team which handles the pressure best, carries the day

Quote.Author: Imran Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: What I perceive, is above all justice, where everyone has the same law

Quote.Author: Imran Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Win or lose today I am proud of the way my boys have played in the tournament

Quote.Author: Imran Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I believed in myself. I never imagined myself as just an ordinary player

Quote.Author: Imran Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: In Pakistan politics is hereditary

Quote.Author: Imran Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: But I don't need to use politics as a way of making money

Quote.Author: Imran Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Pakistan needs to have decentralisation and a good local government system

Quote.Author: Imran Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: If your house is burning, wouldn't you try and put out the fire?

Quote.Author: Imran Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: At the moment we have a ruling class that has one law and the people the other

Quote.Author: Imran Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: During my 21 years of playing cricket, I have never been approached by anyone or offered a bribe

Quote.Author: Imtiaz Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: When you write a story, it just flows and you don't control it. It's subconscious

Quote.Author: Imtiaz Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: The physical journey in my films is indicative of the internal journey that my characters take

Quote.Author: Imtiaz Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything I wanted to do and achieve has not been influential in my life, but my failures have

Quote.Author: Imtiaz Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Love Aaj Kal' is not really a road movie, but it does involve some travel

Quote.Author: Imtiaz Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the 'look at me' kind of a person. I do not like showing off in public or written about

Quote.Author: Imtiaz Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to direct what I feel is interesting - not what is supposed to be my zone

Quote.Author: Imtiaz Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not educated about cinema or genres

Quote.Author: Imtiaz Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to travel as much as I can... I'm always looking for a reason to

Quote.Author: Imtiaz Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: My job is to tell a story, and the decisions about the casting have to be honest

Quote.Author: Imtiaz Ali
Quote.QuoteValue: I think 'Rockstar' is more dear to me than any of my other films

Quote.Author: Ina Garten
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to do everything from scratch. Nobody wants to make puff pastry!

Quote.Author: Ina Garten
Quote.QuoteValue: People have more fun if they don't eat so much they have to be taken home in an ambulance

Quote.Author: Ina Garten
Quote.QuoteValue: I like almonds as a snack - keeps your energy up but doesn't fill you up

Quote.Author: Ina Garten
Quote.QuoteValue: I always like to have flowers on the table. I think they make it look special

Quote.Author: Ina Garten
Quote.QuoteValue: I use other cookbooks for inspiration. I must say I tend to cook from my own cookbooks for parties

Quote.Author: Ina Garten
Quote.QuoteValue: The most overrated tool: a pasta maker. Why make it when you can buy it? It's a lot of work!

Quote.Author: Ina Garten
Quote.QuoteValue: Grilled cheese and tomato soup is the ultimate comfort meal

Quote.Author: Ina Garten
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to take something ordinary and make it really special

Quote.Author: Ina Garten
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think about a Thanksgiving dinner, it's really like making a large chicken

Quote.Author: Ina Garten
Quote.QuoteValue: Creme Brulee is the ultimate 'guy' dessert. Make it and he'll follow you anywhere

Quote.Author: Ingmar Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: I write scripts to serve as skeletons awaiting the flesh and sinew of images

Quote.Author: Ingmar Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: There is something joyous about not talking

Quote.Author: Ingmar Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope I never get so old I get religious

Quote.Author: Ingmar Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, the human face is the most important subject of the cinema

Quote.Author: Ingmar Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: Not a day has gone by in my life when I haven't thought about death

Quote.Author: Ingmar Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm on Faro, I'm never lonely

Quote.Author: Ingmar Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: The anger and the creativity are so closely intertwined with me, and there's plenty of anger left

Quote.Author: Ingmar Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: If I don't create, I don't exist

Quote.Author: Ingmar Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: My pictures are always part of my thinking, and my emotions, tensions, dreams, desires

Quote.Author: Ingmar Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: Aging is not uncomplicated. Creativity is an extraordinary help against destructive demons

Quote.Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous

Quote.Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is good health and a bad memory

Quote.Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: Be yourself. The world worships the original

Quote.Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not whether you really cry. It's whether the audience thinks you are crying

Quote.Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you took acting away from me, I'd stop breathing

Quote.Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: Time is shortening. But every day that I challenge this cancer and survive is a victory for me

Quote.Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: I have grown up alone. I've taken care of myself. I worked, earned money and was independent at 18

Quote.Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: I was the shyest human ever invented, but I had a lion inside me that wouldn't shut up!

Quote.Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: There are advantages to being a star though - you can always get a table in a full restaurant

Quote.Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote.QuoteValue: Never again! I can see no reason for marriage - ever at all. I've had it. Three times is enough

Quote.Author: Ingrid Betancourt
Quote.QuoteValue: I never say no to an ice cream

Quote.Author: Ingrid Betancourt
Quote.QuoteValue: The relationship with time changes when you're captive

Quote.Author: Ingrid Betancourt
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to forget in order to find peace in my soul and be able to forgive

Quote.Author: Ingrid Betancourt
Quote.QuoteValue: I carry the voices of all my family within me, and they were with me there in the jungle

Quote.Author: Ingrid Betancourt
Quote.QuoteValue: In a kidnapping, you leave behind a lot of your baggage, like arrogance and stubbornness

Quote.Author: Ingrid Betancourt
Quote.QuoteValue: You need tremendous spirituality to stop yourself falling into the abyss

Quote.Author: Ingrid Betancourt
Quote.QuoteValue: Reconciliation is a decision that you take in your heart

Quote.Author: Ingrid Betancourt
Quote.QuoteValue: Reconciliation is a national decision that has to be debated and a consensus made among Colombians

Quote.Author: Ingrid Betancourt
Quote.QuoteValue: After six years without seeing one, I love just seeing a smile - every smile I see gives me hope

Quote.Author: Ingrid Betancourt
Quote.QuoteValue: I continue to aspire to serve Colombia as president

Quote.Author: Ingrid Newkirk
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of people have culturally induced ethical blindness, but they can be cured!

Quote.Author: Ingrid Newkirk
Quote.QuoteValue: Never doubt that one person can make a difference

Quote.Author: Ingrid Newkirk
Quote.QuoteValue: Cows are gentle, interesting animals

Quote.Author: Ingrid Newkirk
Quote.QuoteValue: It's time to face facts: Most people stop being environmentalists when they sit down to eat

Quote.Author: Ingrid Newkirk
Quote.QuoteValue: The wonderful thing is that it's so incredibly easy to be kind

Quote.Author: Ingrid Newkirk
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to think of the positive; that's how I cope

Quote.Author: Ingrid Newkirk
Quote.QuoteValue: One hates to be absolute, but in my view, there is no such thing as humane meat

Quote.Author: Ingrid Newkirk
Quote.QuoteValue: Cheap meat is the problem. The answer is to replace meat recipes with vegan meals

Quote.Author: Ingrid Newkirk
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope SeaWorld is exploring how, like Ringling, it can get out of the wild animal business

Quote.Author: Ingrid Newkirk
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, it is one world, and the non-human animals bear the brunt of oppression and suffering

Quote.Author: Ira Sachs
Quote.QuoteValue: Intimacy is something to be cherished, and intimacy is not something to be afraid of

Quote.Author: Ira Sachs
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot of things lost in the Digital Age

Quote.Author: Ira Sachs
Quote.QuoteValue: You can be aware of the passing of time without being nostalgic

Quote.Author: Ira Sachs
Quote.QuoteValue: Fighting bitterness can be a full-time job

Quote.Author: Ira Sachs
Quote.QuoteValue: New York grabbed me too hard, as did adulthood

Quote.Author: Ira Sachs
Quote.QuoteValue: All of my films have been autobiographical - it's all I've got to go on

Quote.Author: Ira Sachs
Quote.QuoteValue: What's interesting to me is the distinction between my old life and my present life

Quote.Author: Ira Sachs
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been hiding crucial events in my life since I was 13

Quote.Author: Ira Sachs
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, every film is actually a form of documentary

Quote.Author: Ira Sachs
Quote.QuoteValue: As a gay person, my life has been marginalized

Quote.Author: Irene Rosenfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no question that consumers are looking for value today

Quote.Author: Irene Rosenfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Mom was a housewife; Dad was an accountant. They taught me a lot about the value of working hard

Quote.Author: Irene Rosenfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Major organizational changes create uncertainty

Quote.Author: Irene Rosenfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: How you manage change can make all the difference

Quote.Author: Irene Rosenfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't play it safe if you want to get ahead

Quote.Author: Irene Rosenfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Exposure to a diversity of disciplines has been exceptionally helpful to me

Quote.Author: Irene Rosenfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I am very excited and delighted to be an important part of the development of corporate America

Quote.Author: Irene Rosenfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I've received many good pieces of advice throughout my life

Quote.Author: Irene Rosenfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: People vote with their hearts, not their heads

Quote.Author: Irene Rosenfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Endorphins are a very powerful thing

Quote.Author: Irina Shayk
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is better than going home to family and eating good food and relaxing

Quote.Author: Irina Shayk
Quote.QuoteValue: My ideal man is faithful, honest, and a gentleman who knows how to treat women

Quote.Author: Irina Shayk
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I wake up and think I look horrible. And sometimes I see a strong woman

Quote.Author: Irina Shayk
Quote.QuoteValue: I love honest men, and a I love a man who is loyal to women

Quote.Author: Irina Shayk
Quote.QuoteValue: I would never do 'Playboy.'

Quote.Author: Irina Shayk
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, I am a lingerie model, but I have class

Quote.Author: Irina Shayk
Quote.QuoteValue: All women have insecurities and bad times. What counts is how you overcome them

Quote.Author: Irina Shayk
Quote.QuoteValue: Money is not important to me. What makes me feel successful is making the people I love happy

Quote.Author: Irina Shayk
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a woman who is very confident with the body, with my body

Quote.Author: Irina Shayk
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course, nothing just falls into your lap - to get where I am now, I've worked hard

Quote.Author: Iris Apfel
Quote.QuoteValue: Great personal style is an extreme curiosity about yourself

Quote.Author: Iris Apfel
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion and interior design are one and the same

Quote.Author: Iris Apfel
Quote.QuoteValue: I swear on everything holy I do not know what's on the Internet about me

Quote.Author: Iris Apfel
Quote.QuoteValue: When you don't dress like everybody else, you don't have to think like everybody else

Quote.Author: Iris Apfel
Quote.QuoteValue: I never buy what someone says is 'in' or a 'must-have.' I buy what makes me happy

Quote.Author: Iris Apfel
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always known in my industry, and I always enjoyed a modicum of popularity

Quote.Author: Iris Apfel
Quote.QuoteValue: It's better to be happy than to be well-dressed

Quote.Author: Iris Apfel
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to improvise

Quote.Author: Iris Apfel
Quote.QuoteValue: I get very involved with my things, and they are not standard equipment

Quote.Author: Iris Apfel
Quote.QuoteValue: I just roll with the punches

Quote.Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: In philosophy if you aren't moving at a snail's pace you aren't moving at all

Quote.Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: Between saying and doing, many a pair of shoes is worn out

Quote.Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in a fantasy world, a world of illusion. The great task in life is to find reality

Quote.Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the difficult realization that something other than oneself is real

Quote.Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything that consoles is fake

Quote.Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: We can only learn to love by loving

Quote.Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: Falling out of love is very enlightening. For a short while you see the world with new eyes

Quote.Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: The cry of equality pulls everyone down

Quote.Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: Being good is just a matter of temperament in the end

Quote.Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is the final cunning of the human soul which would rather do anything than face the gods

Quote.Author: Irrfan Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Parsi theater was known for melodrama

Quote.Author: Irrfan Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: The sign of a good society is where talent is respected

Quote.Author: Irrfan Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to entertain people, but with some substance

Quote.Author: Irrfan Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: Language does not make one an elite

Quote.Author: Irrfan Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: In India, therapy is not part of the culture; it has not become such a big need

Quote.Author: Irrfan Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: It surely gives you a high to be an international actor with quality work

Quote.Author: Irrfan Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't have a culture of realistic acting in India

Quote.Author: Irrfan Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: A film engages you emotionally and intellectually

Quote.Author: Irrfan Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to strike a balance between Bollywood and Hollywood

Quote.Author: Irrfan Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: I will only do a Hollywood film when there is something special offered to me

Quote.Author: Irvine Welsh
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy the freedom of the blank page

Quote.Author: Irvine Welsh
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I've exhausted guys and male friendships

Quote.Author: Irvine Welsh
Quote.QuoteValue: The first job of a writer is to be honest
